name: Reaper of the Valley (Prototype)
description:
What is Reaper of the Valley?

Reaper of the Valley is a 2D platformer where you play as Conrad, the Prince of Violl who died in a terrible accident. He has now been reborn as a reaper and is collecting the souls of the living.

Explore the beautiful worlds

Fight your way through the depths of hell and discover the great kingdom of Violl. Meet plenty of interesting friends and foes on your journey through these two beautiful dark lands.

Heartwarming but tragic story

While escaping his castle to go spend the rest of his days with the love of his life, Genevieve, Conrad ends up in an awful accident barring him from achieving his dreams.

Defeat enemies with different skills

On your journey you will learn many useful skills and spells to become stronger as the foes in your way become even more powerful.

Beautiful hand drawn art

All of the assets in the game are hand drawn by our talented Game Artists.

Team:

Game Developer: Jesse Hirvonen

Game Artist: Martta Friberg

Game Artist: Milla Hämäläinen

Game Narrative: Ilmari Töyrylä

Game Music: Jesse Hirvonen
